name.ja: <ruby>犀子の王様<rt>ダイノス・スタッキング</rt></ruby>

text.en:
Once per turn, when a card or effect is activated (even during the Damage Step) (Quick Effect): You can roll a six-sided die and apply this effect based on this effect's Chain Link number.
● 2: This card gains ATK equal to the result x 500 until the end of this turn.
● 3: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the result x 500.
● 4+: Destroy cards on the field up to the result.
